verbs.description: Because [ARG1: Trump] [ARGM-ADV: really] [V: is] [ARG2: a bumbling “ idiot / moron] : ” Trump issued the directive earlier this year to H.R. McMaster ... McMaster directed his staff at the National Security Council to prepare a presidential memorandum ordering military ...
